abstract.text: Automate the tasks you perform on the Apple Developer website and in App Store Connect.
A response that contains a list of Apps resources.
The error details that an API returns in the response body whenever the API request isnt successful.
Find and list apps in App Store Connect.
Get information about a specific app.
Find and list all available app encryption declarations.
Update app information, including bundle ID, primary locale, price schedule, and global availability.
Update your server-side code to use new features, and test your code against API changes.

doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/docum.title: App Store Connect API 3.6 release notes

abstract.text: Create distribution packages for your apps that you distribute on alternative marketplaces or on the web.
Manage keys you use to sign JSON web tokens (JWTs).

doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/docum.title: Creating and configuring keys for web distribution

abstract.text: Configure subscription groups with the App Store Connect API.
Manage keys you use to sign JSON web tokens and connect marketplaces with apps.

doc://com.apple.appstoreconnectapi/docum.title: Creating keys and establishing alternative marketplace connections

abstract.text: Create JSON Web Tokens (JWTs) signed with your private key to authorize API requests.
Establish a connection between a marketplace and a marketplace app and configure marketplace settings.
